title: Amps to Watts Calculator | Engineering Electrical Tool

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: S = V \\times I \\quad (\\text{1-\\!phase}), \\qquad S = \\sqrt{3} \\times V_{LL} \\times I_{L} \\quad (\\text{3-\\!phase})
formulas.raw: S = V \\times I \\quad (\\text{1-\\!phase}), \\qquad S = \\sqrt{3} \\times V_{LL} \\times I_{L} \\quad (\\text{3-\\!phase})

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: DC: $$ P = V \\times I $$ Single-phase AC: $$ P = V_{\\mathrm{rms}} \\times I_{\\mathrm{rms}} \\times PF $$ Three-phase AC (balanced): $$ P = \\sqrt{3} \\times V_{LL} \\times I_{L} \\times PF $$ Apparent power: $$ S = V \\times I \\quad (\\text{1-\\!phase}), \\qquad S = \\sqrt{3} \\times V_{LL} \\times I_{L} \\quad (\\text{3-\\!phase}) $$ Relation: $$ P = PF \\times S $$
